description.p: (3) Paragraph: 4.3.3

Entity product_group_relationship: The statement "Classification_assignment is used to specify the meaning or type of the relationship." Is very problematic. One requirement is e,g, to establish a sub-group such, that the member of the sub-group are also members of the super-group. To process the particular ROLE must be directly part of this entity.
Remove the quoted sentence. Either a) add a role attribute and specify some relationships such as sub-super or b) provide specific subtypes for different kinds of relationships.
(2) Clause: ARM Express
(3) Paragraph: Representation of quantity
How should the number of members of a group be modelled? Is the use of Assigned_property adequate or are there other means?
We feel that the number of members is not a property, but a value that is derived from the nature of the group. Something like a derived property would probably be adequate.

comment.description: The number of the members of a group may change over time. This is allowed for in the model. As a consequence, it does not make sense to explicitly represent the quantity. Particularly as the membership of the group may be controlled by effectivity. The number of members can be derived. (Either by software or people).
Rejected at BCR workshop. Software should compute the value. The value may change over time and with a derived value its history can not be traced.
